author: Julie Kosin
title: Emma Stone and Jonah Hill to Star in Netfix's Maniac - Maniac on Netflix
text:
In today's political climate, we could all use a little something to look forward to, and today, Netflix delivered. Three of our favorite Oscar nominees—Emma Stone, Jonah Hill and director Cary Fukunaga ( Beasts of No Nation , True Detective Season 1, 2011's Jane Eyre )—are teaming up for a 10-episode dark comedy for the streaming site. Maniac , based on a Norwegian TV show of the same name, follows two patients in a mental hospital who live inside their own fantasies. The project marks Stone and Hill's first time working together since 2007's Superbad .
GIF Giphy The series will shoot in New York City starting August 15 and end in November—which means you have plenty of time to catch up on the rest of your Netflix queue.
In the meantime, Stone is headed to the Oscars on February 26, where she's nominated for Best Actress in La La Land .
